about.title: About Shopiggo
about.subtitle: Simplifying online shopping by unifying access to the world’s leading retailers in a single smart store.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To simplify online shopping by unifying access to the world’s leading retailers in a single smart store. Shopiggo empowers consumers to save time and money with one-click checkout, consolidated rewards through GoCoins, and a seamless shopping experience—while helping retailers recover lost revenue from fragmented multi-store checkouts.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the go-to universal storefront where every consumer can discover, shop, and save across top retail brands—effortlessly. By bridging the gap between shoppers and retailers with a single payment platform and intelligent rewards, Shopiggo envisions a future where convenience, choice, and efficiency define every shopping journey.
